effect.Name: Inverted
effect.description: Inverted - Shader inverts the final colors of the background allowing you to also take into account the colors of the object
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Inverted (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader inverts the final colors of the background allowing you to also take into account the colors of the object

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This option allows you to specify whether the main texture should be included in the final blending.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
